title: Curate Members
items: Share private join links with prospective members.
Promote a group directory with tech-focused member profiles, including things like GitHub profiles and project links.
Send broadcast emails to the entire membership or just those attending an event.

title: Host Events
items: Publish online Video Chat URLs, only accessible to attending members.

title: Document Past Events
items: Attach files to events for things like: slides, notes, photos, videos and links.
Connect presentations to members to build a rich event history.
Share event archives publicly or limit to members-only.

title: Automate and Track Repetitive Admin Tasks
items: Define common things to do for meetings, new members, inactive members, etc.
Perform integrated tasks directly from Guildflow, such as posting event announcements to Twitter.

title: Personalize Your Group Website
items: Choose a public or private privacy level for the group website.
Create custom content pages for things like a group code of conduct, leadership profiles, sponsors or slack/discord invites information.
Subscribe to group or member specific iCal event feeds.
Connect to a GraphQL API and build out custom integrations.

title: Own Your Data and Empower Member Privacy
items: Guildflow is the only meetup solution that has a structured, legal and documented way for members to opt-in to a group export feature.
Access and export the full data of your group when you need to, including member emails.
